Mikautadze doubled Georgia’s lead with a penalty
Post-Match Reflections: Georgia will play Spain in the last 16
Kvaratskhelia scored in the first minute vs Portugal and they are now leading 2-0
The Georgia players and staff celebrated their historic win
Giorgi Mamardashvili made several key saves to secure the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mikautadze scored the second goal via penalty
Georgia’s goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili performed exceptionally well
